Package jdraw.figures

Class RectTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdraw.figures.RectTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawTool
    public class RectTool
extends Object
implements DrawTool
    This tool defines a mode for drawing rectangles.
    See Also:
    Figure

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RectTool​(DrawContext context)
      Create a new rectangle tool for the given context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activate()
      Activates the Rectangle Mode.
      void deactivate()
      Deactivates the current mode by resetting the cursor and clearing the status bar.
      Cursor getCursor()
      Returns the cursor to be used by the draw view if this draw tool is set.
      Icon getIcon()
      Obtain an icon for this tool.
      String getName()
      Obtain the name of this tool.
      void mouseDown​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e)
      Initializes a new Rectangle object by setting an anchor point where the mouse was pressed.
      void mouseDrag​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e)
      During a mouse drag, the Rectangle will be resized according to the mouse position.
      void mouseUp​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e)
      When the user releases the mouse, the Rectangle object is updated according to the color and fill status settings.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Activates the Rectangle Mode. There will be a specific menu added to the menu bar that provides settings for Rectangle attributes
        Specified by:
        activate in interface DrawTool

      • mouseDown

        public void mouseDown​(int x,
                      int y,
                      MouseEvent e)
        Initializes a new Rectangle object by setting an anchor point where the mouse was pressed. A new Rectangle is then added to the model.
        Specified by:
        mouseDown in interface DrawTool
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of mouse
        y - y-coordinate of mouse
        e - event containing additional information about which keys were pressed.
        See Also:
        DrawTool.mouseDown(int, int, MouseEvent)

      • mouseDrag

        public void mouseDrag​(int x,
                      int y,
                      MouseEvent e)
        During a mouse drag, the Rectangle will be resized according to the mouse position. The status bar shows the current size.
        Specified by:
        mouseDrag in interface DrawTool
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of mouse
        y - y-coordinate of mouse
        e - event containing additional information about which keys were pressed.
        See Also:
        DrawTool.mouseDrag(int, int, MouseEvent)

      • mouseUp

        public void mouseUp​(int x,
                    int y,
                    MouseEvent e)
        When the user releases the mouse, the Rectangle object is updated according to the color and fill status settings.
        Specified by:
        mouseUp in interface DrawTool
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of mouse
        y - y-coordinate of mouse
        e - event containing additional information about which keys were pressed.
        See Also:
        DrawTool.mouseUp(int, int, MouseEvent)
